# sqliteutils

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/sqliteutils)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=sqliteutils)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of sqliteutils is to provide utility funcions to deal with SQLite 

## Installation

You can install the released version of sqliteutils from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("sqliteutils")
```
